text: Philippe Entremont (born 7 June 1934 in Reims) is a French classical pianist and conductor. His recordings as a pianist include concertos by Tchaikovsky, Rachmaninoff, Saint-SaÃ«ns and others. ==Other websites== * Brief biography * Columbia Artists Management * Some programs, introduction and photos from his 3 acclaimed tours of Southern Africa, 1958-74 * Brief 2002 interview that includes an interesting discussion about stage fright * Short 1968 news article mentioning his first dual-role recording *1988 English-language interview with Philippe Entremont * [ Biography at allmusic.com] Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:French conductors
title: Philippe Entremont
